resources.string: Ask question here first, then deal cards.
Click on a card for its meaning\nOr continue to your answer.
Click on a card for its meaning\nOr ask the cards another question.

To obtain your OpenAI API key:
Goto https://platform.openai.com
Either create an account or login if you already have one.
Click on your account name in the upper right to open the menu.
Click on "View API Keys" Create a new secret key. You will only be shown this key once, so be sure to copy it somewhere.
(If you lose it, you can go back and create a new one.)
Enter the secret key below.
